text: Daga waɗanda suka tũba (Yahũdu), akwai wasu sunã karkatar da magana daga wurãrenta suna cẽwa: "Munjiya kuma mun ƙiya, kuma ka jiya a wani wurin jiyãwa, kuma rã'ina (da ma'anar 'ruɓaɓɓe'), ka tsare mu," dõmin karkatarwa da harsunansu, kuma dõmin sũkã a cikin addini. Kuma dã lalle sũ, sun ce: "Mun jiya kuma mun yi ɗa'a, kuma ka saurãra kuma ka dãkata mana," haƙĩƙa, dã ya kasance mafi alhẽri a gare su, kuma mafi daidaita; amma Allah Yã la'anẽ su, sabõda kãfircinsu don haka bã zã su yi ĩmãni ba, sai kaɗan.
